metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3004 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The default configuration for the Xerces SAX Parser in Castor before 1.3.3 allows context-dependent attackers to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks via a crafted XML document.

criterions.comment: castor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
